body:
Leicester City have won the league title for the first time in their history. Who were the last first-time winners of the top flight?
      
       Blackburn Rovers
       Manchester City
       Derby County
       Nottingham Forest
      
     Wes Morgan became the third outfield player in Premier League history to play every minute of a title-winning season. Gary Pallister managed it in 1992-93. Who did it last season?
      
       Branislav Ivanovic
       John Terry
       Eden Hazard
       Willian
      
     Saido Berahino took two penalties this season; they came in the same match, were both on target and were both saved by the same goalkeeper. Who?
      
       David de Gea
       Heurelho Gomes
       Adrián
       Jack Butland
      
     Which club went 15 games unbeaten but didn't finish in the top four?
      
       Manchester United
       West Ham United
       Chelsea
       Liverpool
      
     Arsenal have finished above Tottenham for the last 21 seasons. Who was managing Spurs when they last finished above their local rivals?
      
       Gerry Francis
       Christian Gross
       George Graham
       Terry Venables
      
     Which two clubs didn't have any players sent off this season?
      
       Bournemouth and Swansea City
       Crystal Palace and Leicester City
       Liverpool and Manchester United
       Manchester City and Tottenham
      
     Against which goalkeeper was the first goal of the season scored?
      
       Hugo Lloris
       David de Gea
       Tim Howard
       Michel Vorm
      
     Which team made the fewest passes, had the fewest shots on target, attempted the fewest dribbles, had the lowest shooting and passing accuracy, and fielded the oldest average XI this season?
      
       Sunderland
       Newcastle United
       Aston Villa
       West Brom
      
     Which player took the most shots (123), had the most shots on target (75) and scored the most goals (25)?
      
       Sergio Agüero
       Harry Kane
       Jamie Vardy
       Romelu Lukaku
      
     Who was the only player sent off three times this season?
      
       Aleksandar Mitrovic
       Sadio Mané
       John Terry
       Victor Wanyama
      
     Aston Villa played for over 3,500 minutes this season. For how many of them did they hold a lead?
      
       102 minutes
       243 minutes
       1,305 minutes
       2,001 minutes
      
     Who featured in 16 matches this season and was on the losing side in every one of them?
      
       Gabby Agbonlahor
       Jack Grealish
       Wes Hoolahan
       Rolando Aarons
      
     Which club have finished in the same position in the league for the last three seasons?
      
       West Bromwich Albion
       Stoke City 
       Crystal Palace
       Swansea City 
      
     What feat did Georginio Wijnaldum achieve this season?
      
       He was Newcastle's top scorer (with 11 goals) but didn't score any in away matches
       He was Newcastle's top scorer but didn't score in any games where they won points 
       He was Newcastle's top scorer and didn't score a single goal with his feet
       He scored the 25,000th goal in Premier League history
      
     Romelu Lukaku was the fourth-highest scorer in the league with 18 goals. In which month did he last score?
      
       February
       March
       April
       May
      
    
    Solutions
    1:D - In 1977-78., 2:B - Perhaps Terry will repeat his achievement next season., 3:B - Berahino had never missed a penalty in the league before but it wasn't the first time Gomes saved two in a Premier League game., 4:C - They also managed to lose 12 of their matches – nine more than last season., 5:A - Lads, it's Tottenham., 6:D - It pays to keep 11 players on the pitch., 7:D - Kyle Walker scored an own goal past Tottenham's stand-in keeper in their opening day fixture against Manchester United., 8:D - The stats don't make for great reading but Tony Pulis can point to a 14th-place finish and another season in the top flight. , 9:B - Kane became the first English player to win the Golden Boot since Kevin Phillips in 1999-2000., 10:D - Wanyama was given a five-match ban after his third red card., 11:B - Fewer than any other club in Premier League history., 12:B - Perhaps he should have chosen the Republic of Ireland., 13:B - They were on course to do even better but then picked up two points from five matches in April. , 14:A - He really loves St James' Park., 15:B - Lukaku hasn't scored for Everton in 10 matches.
    Scores
    
     7 and above.You answered more wrong than right. Ah well
     8 and above.You answered more right than wrong. That's a success
     9 and above.You answered more right than wrong. That's a success
     10 and above.A solid, if imperfect, 10.
     11 and above.Nicely done
     12 and above.Impressive scoring
     13 and above.Super work. You should work for us
     14 and above.Super work. You should work for us
     15 and above.Perfection
     6 and above.You'll do better next seaon
     5 and above.More of a rugby fan?
     4 and above.More of a rugby fan?
     3 and above.A bad season for you
     2 and above.Not great
     0 and above.Oh dear
     1 and above.Poor show
webTitle: Premier League 2015-16 review: the big quiz of the season
